name: ADVENTUROUS KNIGHT- Light & Shadow
description:
The ADVENTUROUS KNIGHT is back! The hottest sequel that 1997 has to offer, take the KNIGHT on a quest through political tension, dungeon dangers, a forest bathed in perpetual night...

  • 57 Endings (some of them good!) 
  • Over 540 unique illustrations (there are 451)
  • Jokes! Emotions! Riddles!
  • There's one part where a buff ghost takes over the game and tries to scare you

Made for Global Game Jam 2022 as part of the Portland Indie Game Squad!
